page.title: 12SOME WALK'S IN GOODLEIGH
page.content: The following are good walks around Goodleigh.Harford woods which is near West Bradninch.The grid refrence is 603334. It is very peaceful and quiet. Hogs lane the grid refrence is 598342. It is a lovely place, bit of a stoney walk but it is worth it you can see a lot of nature around you.It is very peaceful and you can hear the birds sing. The actual walk starts below the school huts and you end up at the very top of Northleigh hill.Another walk starts at the very bottom of Goodleigh. It is very quiet with a little bit of a stream going through. It is a very shaded place.It ends at Snapper grid ref.593345.Starting at the middle of Northleigh hill grid ref.602343 you can go along a peaceful unmade road to Stoke rivers 3 miles away crossing a stream and woods en route with beautiful views.
